text:
Hey guys! My client has a user who's blind, and he uses NVDA (which is a software for accessibility), but I wonder if it integrates with HubSpot. I've already researched about it and contacted both supports, but until now I haven't had success, unfortunately! :confused:
Does someone here had some similar experience? And/Or could you please help me with that? Thank you in advance!

Hey <@U027D4J0S73>, it looks like NVDA is just an open-source screen reader for Windows, so it should work with HubSpot the same way as any other website/web app; no need for a direct integration. You can think of it the same way as HubSpot not needing an integration to work with mice.

OMG hahahah, shame on me!!! :see_no_evil:
I'll tell that to my client, thank you so much!
